originalText.text:
I've been a subscriber for 8 years. In that time the price doubled, and the service kept deteriorating. The last two years have been bad, with the last 3 months just horrible. Constant missing or damaged deliveries. Bad Customer service.
NOT worth my time and money.

I was planning on pausing the service for a few months, but my customer service call to do that made up my mind to cancel. This is not a good service

originalText.text:
I used Blue Apron for about a year and loved it. I developed a sesame allergy as an adult. I called to ask if Blue Apron could provide a list of ingredients for the meal kits before I chose the meals I wanted. I was told they couldn’t accommodate food allergies.
If Burger King can give me a potato bun instead of a sesame seeded one, then Blue Apron can figure something out.  Let users know if their meal kit will have sesame oil/seeds and hoisin sauce so they don’t pick a meal they can’t eat.

originalText.text:
I've been using this service for a long time now and it's by far the best. I've tried all the competitors but always come back to Blue Apron due to the quality of the ingredients and enjoying the recipes much more.

No, this is not a service to save you money. However, before BA I made pretty much the same few meals every day. When I would get lazy and not want to shop, I'd order take out and spend WAY more and be WAY more unhealthy. I would say I've thoroughly enjoyed 95% of the meals I've made (even the weird looking ones I just decided to try out). I read some of the reviews here about having a poor experience with the customer service and I feel that I've had the opposite experience. In the rare case they forget an ingredient, the customer service has always been friendly and comped my meal.

My final note is that this is a service that truly has changed my life. I mentioned earlier that I would get lazy and order take out. Blue Apron is now a part of my routine. I cook significantly more often with my wife and I've noticed that over time, we have become better chefs! Due to the decrease in takeout, I've lost weight as well which is an added benefit :-)

Obviously I'm a big fan of the service and I recommend it to everyone who asks!

originalText.text: We have been using Hello Fresh and wanted to see what Blue Apron has to offer.  Well our food delivery arrived over 2 days late and the food was room temperature. They issued a refund which was expected but didn't offer a credit or anything to help keep a new customer. Anyway our weekly dinners are ruined and we had to scramble and go grocery shop for the week. I just very surprised that they didn't even try to keep a new customer happy and after reading these reviews am hoping that they don't charge me again. Good bye BA!

originalText.text: I have not ordered Blue Apron for about 2 years now. I saw a promo and logged onto see what meals they were offering never placing an order. I saw that they billed my debit account for $59.94 even though my account had a new expiration date and security code. Called BA and they rectified the issue but it is concerning that this is able to happen . I told the rep to close my account. Not happy that they were able to charge me. Lucky I check my account daily.
